entry.title: Not bad at all!!!
entry.content: Have this on my laptop and was interested to see how it worked on my phone.... Not all stuff is included in "free" app, but good for basic editing. ( also good explanations!)

Not bad at all!!!

Have this on my laptop and was interested to see how it worked on my phone.... Not all stuff is included in "free" app, but good for basic editing. ( also good explanations!)

entry.title: Editing
entry.content: I love this app so much. Because I love photography, I'm constantly taking photos on my phone when I don't bring my camera. This app is my number one app that I use to edit my photos because it's so easy to use but also, has a lot of really amazing things to make my photos stand out.

Editing

I love this app so much. Because I love photography, I'm constantly taking photos on my phone when I don't bring my camera. This app is my number one app that I use to edit my photos because it's so easy to use but also, has a lot of really amazing things to make my photos stand out.

entry.title: Smooth app. üëå At ease with using this üíÖ
entry.content: I'm very happy with this app. The initial menu could be laid out a bit more clear so that I could find my own camera. That's why there's only 4 stars but otherwise it would definitely be a 5 star! But once I got into the app it was all smooth sailing. The horizontal scroll bar is very helpful and clear. I would recommend also liking their page on Facebook to keep up to speed with a the tricks and tweaks you would have never thought you could do!

Smooth app. üëå At ease with using this üíÖ

I'm very happy with this app. The initial menu could be laid out a bit more clear so that I could find my own camera. That's why there's only 4 stars but otherwise it would definitely be a 5 star! But once I got into the app it was all smooth sailing. The horizontal scroll bar is very helpful and clear. I would recommend also liking their page on Facebook to keep up to speed with a the tricks and tweaks you would have never thought you could do!

entry.title: Great photo editing app
entry.content: Exactly what an app should be -- easy to use and does what you want it to do. Fotor allows you to be much more creative with your photographs. I would -- and have -- recommended it to friends.

Great photo editing app
